allQuestion.questionResult_name: What's your real top priority in life?
allQuestion.explanation: Are you focusing on what you really care the most about? Find out what should be at the top of your to-do list!

answers.text: Tell them you might be able to give them a little time.
Agree to help if the favor sounds like a good time.

allQuestion.text: A loved one asks you for a favor, but you're already swamped. You...

allQuestion.questionResult_name: What's your real top priority in life?
allQuestion.explanation: Are you focusing on what you really care the most about? Find out what should be at the top of your to-do list!

answers.text: Hilarious. You might even egg the little tyke on.
Very annoying. Why don't the parents control the little brat?
Unfortunate, but OK. You feel sorry for the parents.
